rooms.description: Grand entrance hall aligned with Vastu principles for positive energy flow.
Spacious open-plan living area merging modern design with traditional elements; ideal for hosting family gatherings.
Modern kitchen integrated with the living room, adhering to local building norms and Vastu alignment of workspaces.
Separate dining area adjacent to the open-plan kitchen for family meals.
Luxury bedroom featuring a spacious balcony for morning light and fresh air; aligned with Vastu principles to enhance sleep quality.
Second luxury bedroom with an adjoining balcony offering views and natural ventilation in accordance with local design standards.
Quiet space for work or study, designed to balance modern functionality with traditional aesthetics.
Compact bathroom for guests, ensuring privacy and convenience.

openings.description: Grand entrance with a canopy to shield from rain, designed per Vastu guidelines for auspicious entry.
Dedicated access doorways leading to balconies that provide expansive views and enhance natural ventilation.
Strategically placed windows following Vastu guidelines for light and airflow, with energy-efficient glazing.
